## Checklist before requesting a review
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code

- Check the correct box. Does this PR contain:
  - [ ] Breaking changes
  - [ ] New functionality
  - [ ] Major changes
  - [ ] Minor changes
  - [ ] Bug fixes
  - [ ] Documentation

- [ ] Proposed changes are described in the CHANGELOG.md

- [ ] CI Tests succeed and look good!
